Introducing the SynCraft Blog

What Is This Blog?

Welcome to the SynCraft Blog. This is where we share updates on our products, development stories, and practical insights about building apps that solve everyday challenges.

SynCraft is a small indie studio focused on products that make daily routines smoother — for kids, families, and anyone looking for a bit of adventure.

What We Will Cover

Here is what you can expect from this blog:

  • Product Updates: New features and improvements for TimeSense and STEALTH RADAR
  • Dev Logs: Behind-the-scenes technical decisions and lessons learned
  • Parenting & Technology: Practical tips on time awareness, routines, and habit-building for children
  • Announcements: Company news and milestones

Stay Connected

We plan to publish new posts regularly. If you have feedback, questions, or topic suggestions, feel free to reach out at hello@syncraft.dev.

Thank you for following along!

FAQ

Q: How often do you publish new articles?
A: We aim for several posts per month. Major product releases and important updates will be published as they happen.
Q: Is there a Japanese version of this blog?
A: Yes. Most articles are available in Japanese as well. Use the language switcher at the top of the page.
Q: How can I send feedback?
A: Please email us at hello@syncraft.dev. We appreciate all feedback and suggestions.
